description:
The match turns up the heat in a one vs. one "Tse Ii Men" between Akagi and Ichikawa! Ichiikawa`s strategy begins to take play as Akagi starts to feel the pressure. However, just as Akagi reaches 5,000 points, he makes a surprising comeback. Nonetheless, with Ichikawa playing a defensive strategy, it seems like an endless match, resulting Akagi to employ more "dirty" methods...
Source: crunchyroll
